mapper.sql: SELECT f.rcp_no rcp_no, f.nickname nickname, f.fav_title fav_title, to_char(f.fav_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') fav_date, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT c.CMT_NO FROM comments c,recipes_cmt r,users u WHERE r.rcp_no=#{favorite.recipeNo} AND r.cmt_no=c.cmt_no AND u.nickname LIKE c.nickname ORDER BY c.CMT_DATE DESC ) ) AS cmtcnt FROM fav_recipes f, recipes r, users u WHERE f.rcp_no = r.rcp_no AND f.nickname = u.nickname AND f.nickname = #{favorite.nickname} ORDER BY fav_date
